ComicInfo.Summary:
An outlaw, a vigilante, a hero bringing justice to those in need, Robyn has been there for her city, even when her city has had a target on her back. With Robyn, still an outlaw from the law in the city she calls home, itâ€™s pretty much torture for her daily not being able to freely roam the streets, and dealing with strikes from all sides. But when a new threat comes to town, one too familiar with torture herself, will it be too much for our favorite archer to handle when she takes on, The Iron Maiden!?
